variables.systemDescription: Adventure Game Studio (AGS) is an open-source development tool primarily used to create graphic adventure games. It combines an integrated development environment (IDE) with a C-based scripting language to manage game logic and assets, making it a popular choice for indie developers in the point-and-click genre.
